languages.text: {n}Каменное лицо Соломона чуть оживляется.{/n} "Слышал, Глейто? Тобой интересуется сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец".
{n}Solomorne's stony expression becomes slightly more animated.{/n} "You hear that, Glaito? The Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} is asking about you."
languages.original_text: {n}Каменное лицо Соломона чуть оживляется.{/n} "Слышал, Глейто? Тобой интересуется сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの岩のように硬い表情が、わずかに和らいだ。{/n}「聞いたか、グライト？ローグトレーダーが、お前のことを気にかけてくれているぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's stony expression becomes slightly more animated.{/n} "You hear that, Glaito? The Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} is asking about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの岩のように硬い表情が、わずかに和らいだ。{/n}「聞いたか、グライト？ローグトレーダーが、お前のことを気にかけてくれているぞ」

languages.text: {n}In Solomornes regungslose Miene kommt ein wenig Bewegung.{/n} "Hörst du das, Glaito? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} selbst fragt nach dir."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's stony expression becomes slightly more animated.{/n} "You hear that, Glaito? The Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} is asking about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Solomornes regungslose Miene kommt ein wenig Bewegung.{/n} "Hörst du das, Glaito? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} selbst fragt nach dir."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de marbre de Solomorne semble presque s'animer en entendant votre question.{/n} « Tu entends, Glaito ? {mf|Le libre-marchand lui-même|La libre-marchande elle-même} veut en savoir plus sur toi ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's stony expression becomes slightly more animated.{/n} "You hear that, Glaito? The Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} is asking about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de marbre de Solomorne semble presque s'animer en entendant votre question.{/n} « Tu entends, Glaito ? {mf|Le libre-marchand lui-même|La libre-marchande elle-même} veut en savoir plus sur toi ! »

languages.text: {n}La expresión imperturbable de Solomorne se ilumina ligeramente.{/n} «¿Oyes eso, Glaito? {mf|El mismísimo|La mismísima} Comerciante Independiente pregunta por ti».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's stony expression becomes slightly more animated.{/n} "You hear that, Glaito? The Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} is asking about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión imperturbable de Solomorne se ilumina ligeramente.{/n} «¿Oyes eso, Glaito? {mf|El mismísimo|La mismísima} Comerciante Independiente pregunta por ti».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙原本冷漠的表情似乎多了一丝活力。{/n}“你听到了吗，格雷托？行商浪人亲自来询问你的情况了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's stony expression becomes slightly more animated.{/n} "You hear that, Glaito? The Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} is asking about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙原本冷漠的表情似乎多了一丝活力。{/n}“你听到了吗，格雷托？行商浪人亲自来询问你的情况了。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un taşı andıran ifadesi biraz daha canlanıyor.{/n} "Duyuyor musun Glaito? Hür Tacir seninle ilgili soru soracak."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's stony expression becomes slightly more animated.{/n} "You hear that, Glaito? The Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} is asking about you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un taşı andıran ifadesi biraz daha canlanıyor.{/n} "Duyuyor musun Glaito? Bizzat Hür Tacir senin hakkında soru soruyor."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's stony expression becomes slightly more animated.{/n} "You hear that, Glaito? The Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} is asking about you."
